alert.note: Alert for Barry (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 10:54AM EDT until April 05 at 11:45AM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Rapids has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Barry County in southwestern Michigan... * Until 1145 AM EDT. * At 1054 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gull Lake, or 12 miles northwest of Battle Creek, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hastings... Nashville... Orangeville... Assyria... Prairieville... Hickory Corners... Dowling... Delton... Pine Lake... Banfield... Cloverdale... Lacey... TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Michigan. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 PM EDT for south central and southwestern Michigan.
